column1: National Institute for Health and Care Excellence

column41:
•Decrease in WTE of on payroll workers by 44.4 in January; overall fixed term contracts decreased by 25.8 WTE compared to December 2019.
• There are a total of 390 off payroll workers. Of these there are 372 OPWs are recorded on ESR. There are 18 OPWs where we are awaiting information from these workers to be added on to ESR.
Decrease in pay expenditure appropriate with reduction of posts and banding in month for on payroll workers.

Specialist Contractors includes inward Secondees working >0.5wte.
The costs for secondees is not included in the Non-payroll staff figures.
